welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stockbridge, a charming city known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. Get ready to explore and delight in all that this beautiful place has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Atlanta Speedway Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at College Park Airport serves as the hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private aviation services, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton County Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The private aviation terminal at Dekalb-Peachtree Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
